name: Visual Planet
tag_list: manufacturing, cambridge, touchscreen, technology, touchfoil, touch, through-window, foil, interactive, vip
overview:
Visual Planet are the pioneers and original manufacturers of unique and innovative touchfoil technology offering touch interactivity to digital signage display solutions worldwide since 2003.

The ViP Interactive Foil can be custom made between sizes of 30 and 167 inch diagonal display format and uses projected capacitance touch technology that can be applied to, and work through any non-metallic material.

Extensively used in Retail, Entertainment, Education, Business and many other public areas Visual Planet’s global network of value added resellers and system integrators use the ViP Interactive Foil to offer large format touch interaction to attract and communicate with a wide variety of audiences.
